name: 智代子
text:
総理！
提案があります！
trans:
Prime Minister!
I have a proposal!

name: 果穂
text:
なんでしょう
厚生労働大臣っ
trans:
What is it?
Minister of Health, Labour and Welfare.

name: 智代子
text: はい！
trans: Yes!

name: 智代子
text:
当日使用する軍手ですが、
ビニール製のものも用意してはどうでしょう？
trans:
It's about the working gloves we use that day,
shall we also prepare some that are made of vinyl?

name: 智代子
text:
きっと、水に濡れてしまうような場合が
あると思います！
trans:
I think there will probably be some occasions
that our gloves get wet by water!

name: 果穂
text:
そ、そうかもしれませんっ
かん境大臣っ、どうでしょう！
trans:
Ye──Yeah, you're probably right.
En-vironment Minister, what do you think?

name: 夏葉
text: はい！
trans: Yes!

name: 夏葉
text:
いい提案だと思うわ
缶やペットボトルには、水が溜まっているケースもあるから
trans:
I think it's a good idea, since cans and PET bottles
tend to have water left in them.

name: 果穂
text:
わかりましたっ
官ぼう長官、どうでしょう！
trans:
Understood,
Chief Cabinet Secretary, what do you think?

name: 樹里
text: はい！
trans: Yes!

name: 樹里
text:
環境大臣も言ってるし、いいんじゃねーか
てか、他のユニットにも知らせたらいいかもな
trans:
As Environment Minister said, why not?
Speaking of which, we should probably inform the
other units about this as well.

name: 樹里
text:
えー……と
……外務大臣、どうだ？
trans:
Eh... umm,
Minister of Foreign Affairs, how about it?

name: 凛世
text: はい……
trans: Yes...

name: 凛世
text:
承知しました……
チェインにて……お伝えしてまいります……
trans:
Duly noted...
I'll inform the others... in CHAIN...

name: 凛世
text:
環境大臣……
ご推薦の……品などは……
trans:
Environment Minister...
About the recommendations for... which kinds
of gloves to buy...

name: 夏葉
text:
あるわよ
少し値は張るけれど……
trans:
There are,
they're a little pricey though...

name: 夏葉
text:
天然ゴムだったり、
地中で分解される素材の物を推薦します
trans:
Like the natural rubber ones,
I recommend those made from materials that
can be decomposed in soil.

name: 智代子
text:
ああー！
エコ、ってことだねっ
trans:
Aah!
You mean they are eco.

name: 果穂
text:
え、エコ……！
ちちゅうで、ぶんかい……っ
trans:
E──Eco...!
In so-il...de-compose...

name: 夏葉
text:
私たちが出すごみには、そのうち自然に還っていくものと
ごみのまま残り続けるものがあるの
trans:
Among the trash we produce, there are some
that return to nature after a while, and some
that remain as trash for a long time.

name: 夏葉
text:
たとえば木や紙でできたものは、
いつか腐って──
trans:
For example, things made out of wood and paper,
they'll rot away someday.

name: 夏葉
text:
つまり微生物によって小さく分解されて、
自然の一部に戻る
trans:
In other words, microbes will break them down
into smaller pieces, thus returning them to nature.

name: 果穂
text:
は、はいっ
それは、学校でちょっと習いましたっ
trans:
Ye──Yes,
I've learned about it a bit in school.

name: 夏葉
text: でも、プラスチックやビニールだとそうはいかないわ
trans: But it's not the same for plastic or vinyl.

name: 夏葉
text:
分解されるまでにビニール袋なら10年から20年、
飲料ボトルは400年以上かかるという計算もあるのよ
trans:
It takes about 10 to 20 years for vinyl bags to
decompose, for drink bottles it's calculated to
take even 400 years.

name: 樹里
text: ええっ！
trans: Eeh!

name: 凛世
trans: 400 years...

name: 樹里
text:
それって、燃やせばいいんじゃねーのか
地面に捨てとくから悪いっつーか……
trans:
Why not burn them away?
If it's such a bad idea to leave them on the ground...

name: 智代子
text:
あれだよ樹里ちゃん、
二酸化炭素が……みたいな！？
trans:
Juri-chan, it's because of erm...
carbon dioxide or something like that...!?

name: 夏葉
text:
そうよ、厚生労働大臣
プラスチックを燃やすことで温室効果ガスを増やしてしまう
trans:
Correct, Minister of Health, Labour and Welfare.
Burning plastic would result in the increase of
green house gases.

name: 夏葉
text:
再利用にも限界があるし、生産量を減らす目途もたたない
結局のところ環境に負荷をかけてしまうの
trans:
Recycling has its limits, there's also hardly any
prospect of reducing production volume. In the
end we're putting more strain on the environment.

name: 樹里
text:
じゃ、じゃあ
ごみが400年溜まりっぱなしになるってことか……？
trans:
S──So,
you mean trash will be just piling up for 400 years...?

name: 夏葉
text:
まぁ、テクノロジーが
解決する部分もあるでしょうけど
trans:
Well, there should be some parts that are solvable
by technologies.

name: 夏葉
text:
そうならないようにどうするべきかを
考えなければならないわ
trans:
Nevertheless, to make sure that doesn't happen,
we must think about what we have to do.

name: 凛世
text:
得心……
いたしました……
trans:
Understood...
and convinced...

name: 凛世
text:
ごみを無くすつもりで……ごみを出してしまっては……
本末転倒……
trans:
If we set out to get rid of trash...
yet end up producing more...
then it's defeating our own purpose...

name: 樹里
text:
なるほどな
んじゃ、やっぱそのエコな手袋買おう
trans:
I gotcha.
That's it then, let's buy those eco-friendly gloves.

name: 智代子
text: 異議なし！
trans: No objection!

name: 果穂
text:
はいっ
異議なしっ！　です！
trans:
Yes!
No objection, too!

name: 夏葉
text:
ありがとう、みんな
……今がよければそれでいいわけではないの──
trans:
Thanks, everyone.
...it's not enough to be content with the
status quo──

name: 夏葉
text:
豊かさを未来にも広げていくためにどうするべきか
国連は、環境問題以外にも17の目標を掲げているわ
trans:
How to ensure our prosperity extends to the future
as well? As a response, the UN has established
17 goals besides the environment problem.

name: 夏葉
text:
それを、
Sustainable Development Goals──
trans:
Also known as,
Sustainable Development Goals──

name: 夏葉
text: 略してSDGsと呼ぶのよ
trans: Or SDGs, for short.

name: 一同
text: SDGs────？
trans: SDGs──?

name: 愛依
text:
って、
なんなん……？
trans:
...uh,
say what again?

name: 冬優子
text: ──海外のセレブがやってる、エコなこととかよ
trans:
──It's been trending among celebrities overseas,
has something to do with eco and such.

name: あさひ
text: へー、知らないっすね
trans: Huh, I didn't know about it.

name: 冬優子
text: ……まぁいいわ
trans: ...oh well.

name: 冬優子
text:
たとえば、昔の衣装をリメイクして着たり
バカ高いドレスをわざわざリサイクル素材で作ったり
trans:
For example, one would remake old outfits and put
them on, or make ridiculously expensive dress from
recycled materials on purpose.

name: 愛依
text: うんうん
trans: Uh-huh.

name: 冬優子
text:
CO2が増えるからプライベートジェットはやめようとか
フードロスをなくそうだとか言って──
trans:
Or like claiming that you'll stop using private jet,
because it produces more CO2, or you'll try to
reduce food waste.

name: 冬優子
text:
地球と人類の未来のこと考えてますってアピールすんのよ
『#SDGs』ってつけてね
trans:
Basically you appeal to the others that you're
thinking about the future of earth and humanity,
and add a "#SDGs" while you are posting about it.

name: あさひ
text:
だから、
そのエスディージーズってなんすか？
trans:
Then,
what does "S-D-G-s" exactly mean?

name: 愛依
text:
なんかの略、
みたいな～？
trans: Maybe an abbreviation of something～?

name: 冬優子
text: ──それは……
trans: ──About that...

name: 冬優子
text:
……検索ですぐ出てくるわよ
自分で調べなさい
trans:
...it'll come up as soon as you search for it,
go look it up yourself.

name: あさひ
text: えー
trans: Ehh...

name: 愛依
text:
アハハ
おべんきょーしよっか♪　あさひちゃん
trans:
Ahaha, Asahi-chan,
let's go learn about it then♪

name: 愛依
text:
──で、それが
ごみ拾いとカンケーあるカンジ？
trans:
──Speaking of which,
so it's somehow related to collecting trash?

name: 冬優子
text:
大ありよ、アピールできるでしょ
拾ってる写真に『#SDGs』って付ければ
trans:
Of course, it's a great opportunity to appeal, right?
We can take photos of us picking up trash and
post them with "#SDGs".

name: 愛依
text:
おお～っ
海外セレブっぽくなる～！？
trans:
Oh wow～
So just like those overseas celebrities～!?

name: 冬優子
text:
そのへんのアイドルとは違うってとこ見せるわよ
知性的でトレンドも押さえてるって、さりげなくね
trans:
It's like saying "See? we are not your average idols",
we'll look intelligent and trendy, but in a subtle way.

name: 愛依
text:
さっすが冬優子ちゃん
色々考えてる～
trans:
That's our Fuyuko-chan!
You do take a lot of things into consideration～

name: あさひ
text:
……よくわかんないっすけど
いっすよ
trans:
...I don't really understand all that,
but ok, I'll go along with it.

name: 冬優子
text:
──……
あんたは投稿する前に一度見せて
trans:
──...
Listen you two, remember to let me take a look
first before you post anything.

name: あさひ
text: えっ

name: 冬優子
text: スマートにやんなきゃ意味ないの
trans: It's meaningless if we don't do it in a smart way.

name: あさひ
text:
えー
なんかさっきから難しいっすね
trans:
Ehh...
What you're saying since a while ago is somehow
difficult to understand.

name: あさひ
text:
ごみ、いっぱい拾うっすよ
なんか面白いもの落ちてないっすかね～！
trans:
Anyway, I'll sure collect a lot of trash,
I wonder if there's anything interesting got
dumped out there～!

name: 愛依
text:
おっ、あさひちゃん
お宝見つけちゃう～？
trans:
Oh, Asahi-chan,
you're going to find some treasures ain't you～?

name: 冬優子
text: ちょっと────！
trans: Wait a minute──!

name: あさひ
text:
いいっすね！
お宝見つけて、アップするっす！
trans:
Sounds great!
I'll find treasures and upload photos of them then!

name: 愛依
text:
アハハ～
よっしゃ～
trans:
Ahaha～
Hooray～

name: 冬優子
text: 待ちなさいってば！
trans: I said wait a minute!

name: 冬優子
text:
やっぱり投稿の前じゃなくて、撮る前に見せて！
いい！？
trans:
On a second thought, instead of before posting,
lemme check before you take any photo!
Copy that!?

name: 甜花
text: ──おつかれ……さまです……
trans: Good day... to you...

name: 甜花
text:
ごみ……ひろ……い……
がん……ばり……ます……
trans:
I'll... try my best...
to collect... trash...

name: 甘奈
text:
よし、オッケー
準備できたっ
trans: All right,  I'm ready.

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さん戻ってきたら
帰れるよー
trans: Let's go home once Chiyuki-san returns.

name: 甜花
text:
あ……うん……
え、えと……
trans:
Ah...umm...
Er──erm...

name: 甜花
text:
これ……
短い、かな……？
trans: Is this... a bit──too short...?

name: 甘奈
text:
──メッセ？
誰に送るの
trans:
──This message?
Who're you sending it to?

name: 甜花
text:
え、と……
真乃ちゃん……
trans:
E──erm...
Mano-chan...

name: 甘奈
text:
わぁ、何々～！
──あー、ごみ拾いのことだ！
trans:
Woah, what for～!
──Ah, it' about the trash collecting!

name: 千雪
text:
お待たせ……！
もう出られるわ
trans:
Sorry to keep you waiting...!
We can leave now.

name: 甘奈
text:
あ、千雪さん待って待って～
なんかね、甜花ちゃんがメッセしてるの
trans:
Ah, Chiyuki-san wait, wait～
You see, Tenka-chan is messaging right now.

name: 甜花
text:
う、うん……！
ごめんなさい……
trans:
Um──umm...!
Sorry about that...

name: 千雪
text:
わ、全然……！
ゆっくり打って？
trans:
Oh my, not at all...!
Just take your time, ok?

name: 甜花
text:
にへへ……
ありがと……
trans:
Nihehe...
Thank you...

name: 甘奈
text:
んー
甘奈は短いって思わないけど────
trans:
Hmm...
Amana doesn't think it's too short though──

name: 甜花
text: そ、そうかな……！
trans: Re──Really...?

name: 甘奈
text:
うん！
でも……
trans:
Yup!
However...

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃんは、
そう思ってないってことだよねっ
trans:
But Tenka-chan,
you don't really feel that way, don't you?

name: 甜花
text:
えっ……
う、うん……
trans:
Eh...
No──No, I don't...

name: 甘奈
text: じゃあ、こう────！
trans: Well then, check this out──!

name: 甜花
trans: ...uhh?

name: 甘奈
text:
写真を送っちゃうの☆
ねぇ、千雪さんも入って～！
trans:
Let's take a photo and send it along☆
Hey Chiyuki-san, come join me～!

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ
なあに、甘奈ちゃん
trans:
Fufu...
What is it, Amana-chan?

name: 甘奈
text:
あのね、今度のごみ拾い頑張るぞーって
写真を撮りたいの！
trans:
You know,
"We'll try our best to collect trash that day"──
Let's take a photo to convey that.

name: 千雪
text: ごみ拾いの……？
trans: About collecting trash...?

name: 甜花
text: あ、あの……
trans: We──Well...

name: 甜花
text:
真乃ちゃんに……
頑張るよって……メッセ、したくて……
trans:
I want to send a message to Mano-chan...
To say that... I will try my best...

name: 甜花
text:
でも、なんか……
……
trans:
Bu──But, somehow the message feels...
......

name: 千雪
text:
どれどれ、いい？
────あぁ……
trans:
Hmm, may I take a look?
──Ah...

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ、うん
ちょっとわかるなぁ
trans:
Fufu, yes,
I kind of see where you are coming from.

name: 甜花
text: 千雪さん……
trans: Chiyuki-san...

name: 千雪
text: 言葉にするとこうなんだけど……
trans:
There's only so much you could do to put them
into words...

name: 千雪
text:
気持ちは、
もっとおっきいんだよねっ？
trans:
But the feelings themselves,
they're much more than that, right?

name: 甜花
text:
……っ
う、うん……ちょっと、足りない……！
trans:
...uhh.
Ye──Yes...words fall a bit short...!

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへっ
だからね、写真で気持ちを撮って載せるんだ☆
trans:
Ehehe.
That's why we should take a photo and carry
our feelings with it☆

name: 千雪
text:
素敵
そういうことなのね
trans:
Wonderful,
so that's what it is about.

name: 千雪
text:
それじゃ、撮って撮って……！
すーっごく気持ち出しちゃうから
trans:
Alright, go ahead and take one now...!
I'll be expressive with how I feel!

name: 甘奈
text: えへへっ、甘奈もー！
trans: Ehehe, Amana will too!

name: 甘奈
text: ──ね、甜花ちゃんっ
trans: Isn't it right, Tenka-chan?

name: 甜花
text:
あ、ありがと……！
うん……っ
trans:
Th-Thanks...
Uhm...

name: 甜花
text:
にへへ……
気持ちを……撮る……
trans:
Nihehe...
To photograph... the feelings...

name: 甜花
trans:
Ok then, get ready...!
3, 2, 1──
